This vignette explains the initialization strategies implemented in `ino`. The vignette was build using R `r paste(R.Version()[6:7], collapse = ".")` with the ino `r utils::packageVersion("ino")` package.

```{r setup}
library(ino)
```

## Random initialization

```{r, example random}
x <- set_f(f = ino:::f_ackley, npar = 2)
x <- set_optimizer(x, "nlm")
x <- random_initialization(x, runs = 10)
```
